recipes.name: Adobo
ingredients: 1 pound pork or chicken, cut into pieces

instructions.action: In a large pot, combine soy sauce, vinegar, bay leaf, peppercorns, garlic, ground black pepper, sugar, and water.
Add the pork or chicken pieces to the marinade.
Bring the mixture to a boil over high heat.
Reduce heat to low and simmer for 30-45 minutes, or until the meat is tender.
Remove from heat and let cool slightly before serving.

recipes.name: Menudo
ingredients: 1 pound beef stew meat, cut into cubes

instructions.action: In a large pot, brown the beef stew meat over high heat.
Add the liver, heart, diced tomatoes, onion, garlic, bay leaf, black pepper, salt, vinegar, and water.
Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 1-2 hours, or until the meat is tender.
Remove from heat and let cool slightly before serving.
